establishment.address: Shop 7, 8, 21, Lower Ground Floor, Meghmayar Plaza, Near Surat Municipal Corporation, City Light, Surat

items.name: Steam Idli [3 Pieces]
items.description: Soft savoury rice cake served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar

items.name: Thattu Idli [2 Pieces]
items.description: 2 Large sized idli sprinkled with our house made Podi and topped with generous amount of butter served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar

items.name: Mini Idli [10 Pieces]
items.description: 10 Pieces of small cute coin size idlis specially for kids served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar

items.name: Butter Idli [3 Pieces]
items.description: Soft savoury rice cake topped with generous amount of butter served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar

items.name: Idli Medu Vada [2 Pieces + 1 Piece]
items.description: Soft savoury rice cake and crispy Vada served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar

items.name: Fried Idli [2 Pieces]
items.description: Idlis that are deep fried and made crunchy served with 3 different type of chutneys

items.name: Masala Idli
items.description: Idli sauté with onion, garlic, coriander, tomatoes with a tangy taste served with 3 different type of chutneys

items.name: Rasam Idli
items.description: A soup of Spices and 2 pieces of Idli served with 3 different type of chutneys

items.name: Cheese Idli [3 Pieces]
items.description: Soft savoury rice cake topped with lots of cheese served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar

items.name: Masala Dosa
items.description: Masala Dosa is a thin, crispy, and savory pancake made from a batter of fermented rice and urad dal stuffed with potato masala(aloo bhaji) served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Plain Dosa
items.description: Plain Dosa is a thin, crispy, and savory pancake made from a batter of fermented rice and urad dal served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar

items.name: Mysore Masala Dosa With Potato Bhaji
items.description: Myosre Dosa is a thin, crispy, and savory pancake made from a batter of fermented rice and urad dal spiced with green chutney and house made Podi powder stuffed with potato masala(Aloo bhaji) served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Rava Onion Masala Dosa
items.description: Rava Onion Masala Dosa is a thin, crispy, and savory pancake made with semolina, rice flour and spices stuffed with potato masala(aloo bhaji) topped with onions served 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Chetinaad Dosa
items.description: Chetinaad Dosa is a thin, crispy, and savory pancake made from a batter of fermented rice and urad dal spiced with chetinaad(tomato) chutney and house made Podi powder served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Cheese Dosa
items.description: Cheese Dosa is a thin, crispy, and savory pancake made from a batter of fermented rice and urad dal topped with plenty of cheese served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Rava Onion Dosa
items.description: Rava Onion Dosa is a thin, crispy, and savory pancake made with semolina, rice flour and spices topped with onions served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Mini Dosa Platter
items.description: Mini Dosa Platter consists of 3 different dosa namely Plain, Mysore Dosa & Chetinaad Dosa served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Mysore Dosa
items.description: Myosre Dosa is a thin, crispy, and savory pancake made from a batter of fermented rice and urad dal spiced with green chutney and house made Podi powder served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Paneer Roast Dosa
items.description: Paneer roast dosa is a delicious South Indian dish that combines the flavors of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) roast with the popular dosa mixed with onion, tomato, house made Podi powder served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Rava Dosa
items.description: Rava Dosa is a thin, crispy, and savory pancake made with semolina, rice flour and spices served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Ghee Podi Dosa
items.description: Ghee Podi Dosa is a thin, crispy, and savory pancake made from a batter of fermented rice and urad dal topped with generous amount of GHEE and PODI powder served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Rava Masala Dosa
items.description: Rava Masala Dosa is a thin, crispy, and savory pancake made with semolina, rice flour and spices stuffed with potato masala(aloo bhaji) served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Neer Dosa
items.description: Neer Dosa Literally means Water Dosa In Kannada. It is made with rice and coconut flavour and served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Onion Dosa
items.description: Onion Dosa is a thin, crispy, and savory pancake made from a batter of fermented rice and urad dal topped with onions served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Onion Masala Dosa
items.description: Onion Masala Dosa is a thin, crispy, and savory pancake made from a batter of fermented rice and urad dal stuffed with potato masala(Aloo bhaji) & topped with onions served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Raagi Dosa [Millet Dosa]
items.description: Ragi dosa, also known as finger millet dosa, is a nutritious and gluten-free South Indian pancake made from ragi flour served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Set Dosa With Vadai Curry
items.description: Set Dosa also known as Sponge Dosa is a thick, soft and fluffy Dosa variety made with rice, urad dal, fenugreek seeds and poha served with Vadai curry and 3 different types of chutneys.

items.name: Beetroot Dosa
items.description: Beetroot dosa is a colorful and nutritious variation of the traditional South Indian dosa, incorporating beetroot into the batter served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Coconut Dosa
items.description: Coconut Dosa is a thin, crispy, and savory pancake made from a batter of fermented rice and urad dal topped with freshly grated coconut, onions & coriander served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Patta Dosa
items.description: Patta dosa is made by infusing the batter on Banana leaf and roasting it on the grill on both sides along with coconut, onion, house made Podi Powder & coriander served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Ghee Podi Masala Dosa
items.description: Ghee Podi Masala Dosa is a thin, crispy, and savory pancake made from a batter of fermented rice and urad dal topped with generous amount of GHEE and PODI powder stuffed with potato masala(Aloo bhaji) served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Adai Dosa With Avial
items.description: Adai dosa is a savory pancake made from a batter consisting of mixed lentils and rice. Avial, on the other hand, is a traditional South Indian vegetable curry or stew made with a variety of vegetables like carrots, beans, drumsticks, potatoes cooked in a coconut-based gravy flavored with curry leaves and cumin served with 3 different types of chutneys.

items.name: Onion Tomato Utthapam
items.description: Onion Tomato utthapam is a variation of dosa, which is slightly thick topped with Onion, tomato, green chilly and coriander served with 3 different types of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Masala Utthapam
items.description: Masala utthapam is a variation of dosa, which is slightly thick topped with Onion, tomato, aloo bhaji, green chilly and coriander served with 3 different types of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Onion Utthapam
items.description: Onion utthapam is a variation of dosa, which is slightly thick topped with Onion, green chilly and coriander served with 3 different types of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Tomato Utthapam
items.description: Tomato utthapam is a variation of dosa, which is slightly thick topped with tomato, green chilly and coriander served with 3 different types of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Mini Utthapam Platter
items.description: Four different types of utthapam (Plain, Tomato, Onion and Masala) served with 3 different types of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Plain Utthapam
items.description: Plain utthapam is a variation of dosa, which is slightly thick topped with coriander served with 3 different types of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Coconut Utthapam
items.description: Coconut utthapam is a variation of dosa, which is slightly thick topped with freshly grind coconut, green chilly and coriander served with 3 different types of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Podi Utthapam
items.description: Ghee podi uttapam is a variation of dosa, which is slightly thick topped with generous amount of ghee and podi, green chilly and coriander served with 3 different types of chutneys and sambhar.

items.name: Medu Vada [2 Pieces]
items.description: Crispy from outside and soft from inside Vada served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar

items.name: Daal Vada [6 Pieces]
items.description: Crispy fried Vada(fritters) made with lentils and mixed with spices and herbs served with 3 different type of chutneys

items.name: Thairu [Curd] Vada [2 Pieces]
items.description: Extremely soft Vada mixed with generous amount of sweet curd topped with pomegranate and cumin powder

items.name: Onion Medu Vada [2 Pieces]
items.description: Crispy from outside and soft from inside Vada mixed with onion served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar

items.name: Rasam Vada [6 Pieces]
items.description: A soup of Spices and 6 pieces of small round shaped vada served with 3 different type of chutneys

items.name: Medu Vada Platter
items.description: 1 pc Medu Vada, 1 pc Onion Medu Vada and 2 pieces of Daal Vada served with 3 different type of chutneys and sambhar

items.name: Veg Upma
items.description: A popular South Indian breakfast with Suji flour(Rava/Semolina), veggies, spices and herbs.

items.name: Rava Upma
items.description: A popular South Indian breakfast with Suji flour(Rava/Semolina) spices and herbs.

items.name: Lemon Ginger With Water
items.description: Lemon ginger water is a refreshing beverage infused with the zesty tang of lemon and the spicy warmth of ginger along with sugar.

items.name: Coconut Sweet Lassi
items.description: Coconut Sweet lassi has creamy texture and refreshing taste made with yogurt, sugar, infused with freshly grated coconut and topped with Almonds.

items.name: Butter Milk [Neer Mor]
items.description: Buttermilk(Chaas) is a smooth and creamy dairy beverage with a tangy flavor profile

items.name: Sweet Fresh Lime Soda
items.description: Freshly squeezed limes sweetened with a syrupy infusion of sugar mixed with cold soda water.

items.name: Sweet Lassi
items.description: Sweet lassi is a delicious Indian beverage which has creamy texture and refreshing taste made with yogurt, sugar and topped with Almonds.

items.name: Lemon Ginger With Soda
items.description: Lemon ginger with soda is a refreshing beverage that combines the zesty citrus flavor of lemon, the warm spiciness of ginger, and the refreshing fizz of soda water along with sugar.

items.name: Salty Fresh Lime Soda
items.description: Adding a pinch of salt to freshly squeezed limes mixed with cold soda water.

items.name: Mini Plain Dosa + Steam Idli [2 Pieces]
Steam Idli [2 Pieces] + 250 ML Thums Up
items.description: | Serves 1 , 2 Pcs | | Not spicy |

items.name: Mini Masala Dosa + 200 ML Butter Milk
items.description: | Serves 1 |

items.name: Thattu Idli [1 Pieces] + 100 ML Rasam
items.description: | Serves 1 |

items.name: Mini Chetinaad Dosa + 200 ML Butter Milk
Mini Chetinaad Dosa + 250 ML Thumps Up
Thairu Sadham [Curd Rice]
items.description: Curd Rice is a South Indian dish where rice is simply mixed with curd and salt. It is later finished off with a flavorful tempering made with basic whole spices & curry leaves. Garnished with some coriander leaves and Pomegranate. Served with Aplam(Papad)

items.name: Rasam Rice
items.description: Served With Aplam[Papad]

items.name: Bisibella Bhaat
items.description: Bisibella Bhaat is a flavourful dish made with rice, lentils and vegetables that is tempered with typical South Indian spices and nuts. A special spice blend called the Bisibella Bhaat Sambhar is also added to it, which gives it the authentic taste. Served with Aplam(Papad).

items.name: Dakshini Veg Biryani With Raita
items.description: Dakshina Veg Biryani is an aromatic rice dish made with basmati rice, mix veggies, herbs & house made South Indian Style spices served with Raita. Served with Aplam(Papad)

items.name: Lemon Sadham
items.description: Lemon rice has a delicate flavour of fresh lemon juice and nutty aroma of the tempered ingredients like lentils, spices and herbs. Served with Aplam(Papad)

items.name: Tomato Sadham
items.description: Tomato Rice is a simple, spicy, flavorful & delicious dish made with rice, tomatoes, spices & herbs. Served with Aplam(Papad)

items.name: Tamarind Sadham
items.description: Tamarind rice is a popular South Indian delicacy which is tangy, sour & spiced flavour. Also known as Puliyogare rice. Served with Aplam(Papad)

items.name: Puri Bhaji [4 Puri]
items.description: 4 pieces of Puri served with South Indian style aloo bhaji

items.name: Kuzhi Paniyaram Rice Balls
items.description: [Soft Inside, Crispy Outside]

items.name: Aapam With Stew
items.description: Bowl shaped Dosa having a sweet mild coconut flavour served with Stew(made of carrot, beans, coconut milk and spices) served with 3 different type of chutneys

items.name: Potato Bonda With Chutney
items.description: Bonda is a deep-fried South Indian potato snack with savory flavour served with 3 different types of chutneys.

items.name: Ven Pongal
items.description: Ven Pongal is a traditional South Indian dish made with ghee, rice and lentils served with 3 different type of chutneys

items.name: Iddiyapam With Vadai Curry
items.description: Sevai Made of rice flour served with Vadai Curry(made of lentil Vada, coconut milk and many spices) and three different types of chutneys.

items.name: Aapam With Vadai Curry
items.description: Bowl shaped Dosa having a sweet mild coconut flavour served with Vadai Curry(made of lentil Vada, coconut milk and many spices) served with 3 different type of chutneys

items.name: Thairu Bundi [Curd]
items.description: Thairu meaning Dahi in South India mixed with Bundi and tadka.

items.name: Iddiyapam With Butter Podi
items.description: Sevai Made of rice flour and tempering with butter, podi and seasoning served with three different types of chutneys.

items.name: South Indian Sapad [Thali]
items.description: | Serve 1 | | Not spicy | Rice Chapati [2 Pieces] + Kulumbu [Gravy Sabji] + Kootu [Semi Gravy Sabji] + Poriyal [Dry Sabji] + Rasam [Dal/Tomato] + Steam Rice + Sapad Sambhar + Daal Vada [2 Pieces] + Aplam [Papad] [2 Pieces] + Payasam/Kesari Bhaat + Thairu [Curd] + Pickle + Lemon Ginger |

items.name: Pineapple Kesari
items.description: Pineapple Kesari Bhaat is a rich sweet made with rava, sugar, nuts, saffron, water and ghee infused with Pineapple chunks and topped with almonds.

items.name: Payasam With Vermicelli
items.description: Payasam is a pudding/porridge made by boiling milk, sugar, cashews, cardamom, raisins and rice sevai.

items.name: Kesari Bhaat
items.description: Kesari Bhaat is a rich sweet made with rava, sugar, nuts, saffron, water, ghee and topped with almonds.

items.name: Coconut Kesari Bhaat
items.description: Coconut Kesari Bhaat is a rich sweet made with rava, sugar, nuts, saffron, water and ghee infused with coconut and topped with almonds.

items.name: Tomato Rasam
items.description: Tomato Rasam is a tangy and aromatic South Indian soup made primarily with tomatoes, tamarind, ginger, garlic and a blend of spices.

items.name: Daal Rasam
items.description: Daal Rasam, also known as Paruppu Rasam, is a traditional South Indian soup-like dish made from cooked lentils and a flavorful Garlic, ginger and tamarind broth and a blend of spices.

items.name: Avial
items.description: Avial is a traditional South Indian vegetable curry or stew made with a variety of vegetables like carrots, beans, drumsticks, potatoes cooked in a coconut-based gravy flavored with curry leaves and cumin served with 3 different types of chutneys.

items.name: Vadai Curry
items.description: Vadai Curry is a flavorful and hearty South Indian dish made with vada, which are savory lentil fritters, cooked in a spiced and tangy curry sauce in coconut milk.
